title: How to Make Honey Cornflakes

steps.headline: Melt the butter in the microwave for 2 minutes.
Add in the condensed milk, mix it, and then put the mixture back into the microwave for 40 seconds.
Pour in the honey after microwaving.
Crush the cornflakes into smaller pieces.
Pour in about 9 tablespoons of the butter mixture into the each bowl of crushed cornflakes.
Arrange baking cups on a baking tray, and then fill them with the cornflakes.
Put it in the oven for 10 minutes at 170 degrees centigrade.
Once melted, decorate with sprinkles and drizzle with some honey on top.

text: Melt the butter in the microwave for 2 minutes.  Add in the condensed milk, mix it, and then put the mixture back into the microwave for 40 seconds.  Pour in the honey after microwaving.  Divide the cornflakes into 3 bowls.  Crush the cornflakes into smaller pieces.  Pour in about 9 tablespoons of the butter mixture into the each bowl of crushed cornflakes.  Arrange baking cups on a baking tray, and then fill them with the cornflakes.  Put it in the oven for 10 minutes at 170 degrees centigrade.  Once melted, decorate with sprinkles and drizzle with some honey on top.
